title: LinkedIn Job Scraper Input
description: This actor allows you to scrape job listings from LinkedIn based on keywords, location, or company name.

search_mode.title: Search Mode
search_mode.description: Choose how you want to search for jobs.

keyword.title: Job Keyword
keyword.description: Job title, keyword, or company you're looking for (e.g., 'software developer', 'marketing', 'Google').

location.title: Location
location.description: Location where you want to search for jobs (e.g., 'New York', 'United States', 'Remote').

company.title: Company Name
company.description: Name of the company whose jobs you want to scrape (e.g., 'Google', 'Microsoft', 'Amazon').

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages to Scrape
max_pages.description: Maximum number of search result pages to scrape (each page contains ~25 jobs).

max_jobs.title: Maximum Jobs to Scrape
max_jobs.description: Maximum number of jobs to scrape (0 = no limit).

linkedin_session_id.title: LinkedIn Session ID (li_at cookie)
linkedin_session_id.description: LinkedIn session cookie (li_at) for authenticated access. Required for accessing all job details.

linkedin_jsessionid.title: LinkedIn JSESSIONID cookie
linkedin_jsessionid.description: LinkedIn JSESSIONID cookie for authenticated access. Optional but recommended.

start_urls.title: Specific Job URLs
start_urls.description: List of specific LinkedIn job URLs to scrape.

collect_urls_only.title: Collect URLs Only
collect_urls_only.description: If enabled, the actor will only collect job URLs and add them to the request queue without parsing job details.

process_url.title: Process Single Job URL
process_url.description: Process a single job URL (typically from the request queue).

debug.title: Debug Mode
debug.description: Enable debug mode for more detailed logging.
